吹奏邊爐
So where are all the geniuses who were calling him too slow and immobile for this league, LOL??

It’s rare when I covet a player from another team for a couple of years and then we actually get that player with minimum fuss the way we did Fab. It wasn’t just youtube clips, I had seen a lot of this player while at Monaco so there was never any doubts from me that we had bought an absolute mint of a player. It was really baffling reading the comments about him early on when he wasn’t getting much playing time. Even the Arsenal game problems were to me overly exaggerated.

Just glad even the sceptics are starting to see what an excellent signing this guy is going to be for us long term. Excellent - and I too liked his partnership with Gini. Can’t wait to see him and Keita play with Gini as the 3 and I can’t wait for the Fab, Keita, Ox midfield for the long term. Will be excellent and so well balanced and perfectly supplemental to our front 3.
